channel.title: Bar Plot on Dominic Mariano's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Bar Plot on Dominic Mariano's blog

item.title: Bar Plot
item.description: library(Lahman) library(sqldf) library(devtools) library(ggplot2) # extracting the data---------------------------- query<-"SELECT name,HR FROM Teams Where yearID=1980 ORDER BY HR" result<-sqldf(query) result$name<-factor(result$name,levels=result$name) # visualizing the data----------------------------- ggplot()+ geom_bar(data=result,aes(x=name,y=HR),stat='identity',color='blue',fill='white')+ coord_flip()+ ylab("homeruns")+ xlab("team")+ ggtitle("1980 Team Homerun Distribution")
